newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: CRICKET-E.P. 154-3 AT TEA AGAINST W.PROVINCE.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-E.P. 154-3 AT TEA AGAINST W.PROVINCE.

text.p: Eastern Province, chasing 330 to win from a minimum of 92 overs, were 153 for three in their second innings at tea on the final day of their four-day Supersport Series cricket match against Western Province at St George's Park on Monday.
Western Province 401 for two declared (Desmond Haynes 202 not out, Jacques Kallis 94) and 228 for six declared (Jacques Kallis 79, H.D.Ackerman 102 not out).
Eastern Province 300 for nine declared (Louis Koen 128, Mark Rushmere 74; Meyrick Pringle 4-79) and 154 for three in 54 overs (Kepler Wessels 78 not out).
